fullText: Hayes delivers a captivating performance as the neurotic, witty pianist, bringing both vulnerability and sharp comedic timing to the role.

bwwExcerpt: But near the end, Levant gets behind the piano and plays Gershwin’s 'Rhapsody in Blue' on NBC. Hayes, a gifted piano player himself, does this in full view of the audience — and from memory. That thrilling moment — without mannerisms, words, other characters or exposition — is the only time Levant and 'Good Night, Oscar' come to life.
